original_title: Probe begins as naked body of young female found near hotel in Kalutara
original_body_lines: The Kalutara South Police have launched  investigations after a naked body of a 16-year old female was found near the railway line behind a hotel on the main street of Galle Road in Kalutara.
The deceased had reportedly come to the hotel with another young woman and two men on Saturday evening and had booked two rooms in the hotel.

According to investigations, a couple had left the hotel a few hours after and later the person who had been with the deceased had also left the hotel.  After that, the body of the girl was found near the railway track behind the hotel.
Police have arrested the other young man and woman who were in this group on suspicion over the death and investigations are underway to find the young man who had accompanied the deceased.
Police said investigations are underway to find out whether this is a murder.(DSB)
